refnamediv.refname: d2i_X509_CRL, i2d_X509_CRL, d2i_X509_CRL_bio, d2i_X509_CRL_fp, i2d_X509_CRL_bio, i2d_X509_CRL_fp, i2d_re_X509_CRL_tbs

refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: X509_CRL *d2i_X509_CRL(X509_CRL **a, const unsigned char **pp, long length); int i2d_X509_CRL(X509_CRL *a, unsigned char **pp);
int i2d_X509_CRL_bio(BIO *bp, X509_CRL *x); int i2d_X509_CRL_fp(FILE *fp, X509_CRL *x);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: These functions decode and encode an X509 CRL (certificate revocation list).
Otherwise the functions behave in a similar way to d2i_X509() and i2d_X509() described in the d2i_X509 3 manual page.
